Package com.example.orange.data.firebase

Class FirebaseService

java.lang.Object
com.example.orange.data.firebase.FirebaseService
public class FirebaseService extends Object
FirebaseService provides methods to interact with Firebase Firestore. It handles operations for users and events.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    static class 
    FirebaseService.FirebaseServiceException
    Custom exception class for FirebaseService-related errors.

  • Constructor Details

    • FirebaseService

      public FirebaseService()
      Constructor for FirebaseService. Initializes the Firestore instance.

  • Method Details

    • getUserByDeviceIdAndType

      public void getUserByDeviceIdAndType(String deviceId, UserType userType, FirebaseCallback<User> callback)
      Retrieves a user from Firestore based on device ID and user type.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The device ID of the user to retrieve.
      userType - The type of the user (e.g., ENTRANT, ORGANIZER, ADMIN).
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • signInUser

      public void signInUser(String deviceId, UserType userType, FirebaseCallback<Boolean> callback)
      Signs in a user or organizer. If the user does not exist in Firestore, it creates a new one.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The device ID of the user.
      userType - The type of user (ENTRANT or ORGANIZER).
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the sign-in operation.

    • logOut

      public void logOut()
      Logs out the current user by clearing the session.

    • createUser

      public void createUser(User user, FirebaseCallback<String> callback)
      Creates a new user in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to be created in Firestore.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Updates an existing user in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      user -
      callback -

    • getUserById

      public void getUserById(String userId, FirebaseCallback<User> callback)
      Retrieves a user by their unique user ID from Firebase Firestore.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier of the user.
      callback - The callback to handle the response, which provides the User object if found, or null if the user is not found.

    • createEvent

      public void createEvent(Event event, String userId, FirebaseCallback<String> callback)
      Creates a new event in Firestore and updates the organizer's eventsOrganizing list atomically.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object to be created in Firestore.
      userId - The ID of the organizer creating the event.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • getEventById

      public void getEventById(String eventId, FirebaseCallback<Event> callback)
      Retrieves an event from Firestore based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to retrieve.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • updateEvent

      public void updateEvent(Event event, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Updates an existing event in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object with updated information.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(String eventId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Deletes an event from Firestore based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to delete.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • addToEventWaitlist

      public void addToEventWaitlist(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Adds a user to the waitlist of an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

      public void removeFromEventWaitlist(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Removes a user from the waitlist of an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

    • moveFromWaitlistToParticipants

      public void moveFromWaitlistToParticipants(String eventId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Moves the first user from the waitlist to participants if the event is not full.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

    • getAllEvents

      public void getAllEvents(FirebaseCallback<List<Event>> callback)
      Retrieves all events from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • getUserEvents

      public void getUserEvents(String userId, FirebaseCallback<List<Event>> callback)
      Retrieves all events associated with a user, whether they are in the waitlist, selected participants, or confirmed participants. *
      Parameters:
      userId - String representing the unique ID of the current user.
      callback - FirebaseCallback<List> to handle the result, providing a list of Event objects the user is associated with (either in the participants or waiting list).

    • getUserEventsWithoutCancelled

      public void getUserEventsWithoutCancelled(String userId, FirebaseCallback<List<Event>> callback)
      Retrieves all events associated with a user, whether they are in the waitlist, selected participants, or confirmed participants.
      Parameters:
      userId - String representing the unique ID of the current user.
      callback - FirebaseCallback<List> to handle the result, providing a list of Event objects the user is associated with (either in the participants or waiting list).

    • removeFromEventParticipants

      public void removeFromEventParticipants(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Removes a specified user from the list of participants in a given event. This function enables the "Leave Event" functionality, allowing users to leave events they have joined.
      Parameters:
      eventId - String representing the unique ID of the event from which the user will be removed.
      userId - String representing the unique ID of the user to be removed from the participants list.
      callback - FirebaseCallback to handle the success or failure of the operation.

    • addToSelectedParticipants

      public void addToSelectedParticipants(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Adds a specified user to the selected participants list for an event. This is typically used for users chosen through a lottery system.
      Parameters:
      eventId - String representing the unique ID of the event.
      userId - String representing the unique ID of the user to be added to the selected participants list.
      callback - FirebaseCallback to handle the success or failure of the operation.

    • removeFromSelectedParticipants

      public void removeFromSelectedParticipants(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Removes a specified user from the selected participants list for an event. This may be used if a user decides not to participate or if they are no longer eligible.
      Parameters:
      eventId - String representing the unique ID of the event.
      userId - String representing the unique ID of the user to be removed from the selected participants list.
      callback - FirebaseCallback to handle the success or failure of the operation.

    • getOrganizerEvents

      public void getOrganizerEvents(String organizerId, FirebaseCallback<List<Event>> callback)
      Retrieves all events created by a specified organizer from Firebase.
      Parameters:
      organizerId - String representing the unique ID of the organizer.
      callback - FirebaseCallback<List> to handle the result, providing a list of Event objects.

      public void storeEventHash(String eventId, String hash)

      public void getEventWaitlist(String eventId, FirebaseCallback<List<String>> callback)
      Retrieves a list of entrants on the waiting list for a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to retrieve waitlist details.
      callback - Callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • joinEventWaitlist

      public void joinEventWaitlist(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Adds a user to the waitlist of an event and updates the user's waitlisted events.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to join.
      userId - The ID of the user joining the event.
      callback - A callback to handle success or failure.

      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to delete.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure.

      public void deletePosterAdmin(String eventId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)

      Parameters:

      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • deleteQR

      public void deleteQR(String eventId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Deletes an event QR hashed data from the database based on the event ID
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique event Id
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • addUserToWaitlist

      public void addUserToWaitlist(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Adds a user to an event's waitlist and updates the user's eventsWaitlisted list. Assumes that event existence and capacity have been validated beforehand.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

    • removeUserFromWaitlist

      public void removeUserFromWaitlist(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Removes a user from an event's waitlist and updates the user's eventsWaitlisted list. Assumes that event existence and user's waitlist status have been validated beforehand.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

    • moveUserFromWaitlistToParticipants

      public void moveUserFromWaitlistToParticipants(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Moves a user from the waitlist to participants and updates both Event and User documents. Assumes that event is not full and user is on the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

    • cancelUserParticipation

      public void cancelUserParticipation(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Cancels a user's participation in an event, moving them to the cancelled list and updating User lists. Assumes that user is either a participant, selected participant, or waitlisted.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

    • acceptEventInvitation

      public void acceptEventInvitation(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Updates both Event and User documents when a user accepts an invitation to participate. Assumes that event is not full and user is a selected participant.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

    • declineEventInvitation

      public void declineEventInvitation(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Updates both Event and User documents when a user declines an invitation to participate. Assumes that user is a selected participant.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - Callback for success or failure.

    • moveUsersToSelectedParticipants

      public void moveUsersToSelectedParticipants(String eventId, List<String> selectedUsers, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)

    • createNotification

      public void createNotification(Notification notification, FirebaseCallback<String> callback)
      Creates a new notification in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      notification - The Notification object to be created.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • getNotificationById

      public void getNotificationById(String notificationId, FirebaseCallback<Notification> callback)
      Retrieves a notification by its ID.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - The ID of the notification.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • getNotificationsForUser

      public void getNotificationsForUser(String userId, FirebaseCallback<List<Notification>> callback)
      Retrieves all notifications for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • updateNotification

      public void updateNotification(Notification notification, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Updates a notification in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      notification - The Notification object with updated data.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • deleteNotification

      public void deleteNotification(String notificationId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Deletes a notification from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - The ID of the notification to delete.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • createDrawNotifications

      public void createDrawNotifications(String eventId, List<String> selectedUserIds, List<String> unselectedUserIds, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Creates notifications for selected and unselected users after drawing participants.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      selectedUserIds - List of user IDs who were selected.
      unselectedUserIds - List of user IDs who were not selected.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • removeUserFromEventLocation

      public void removeUserFromEventLocation(String eventId, String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Removes the user's location entry entirely from the event's location field in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      eventId - Unique ID of the event.
      userId - Unique ID of the user.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure.

    • updateUserReceiveNotifications

      public void updateUserReceiveNotifications(String userId, boolean receiveNotifications, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Updates only the receiveNotifications field for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      receiveNotifications - The new notification preference.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the operation.

    • setUserFCMToken

      public void setUserFCMToken(String userId, String token, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Updates the user's FCM token in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      token - The FCM token to set.
      callback - A callback to handle success or failure.

    • removeUserFCMToken

      public void removeUserFCMToken(String userId, FirebaseCallback<Void> callback)
      Removes the user's FCM token from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      callback - A callback to handle success or failure.
